description: This file defines the NoteEditActivity class, an Android activity that provides a user interface for creating and editing notes within the app. It handles user interactions, loads existing note data when editing, and saves new or updated notes via a repository.

classes.name: NoteEditActivity
classes.description: An Android activity for creating and editing notes, managing user input, and persisting note data through a repository.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes activity, sets up the UI, loads existing note data if editing.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu for the activity.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections, notably saving the note.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Saves a new or existing note based on user input.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Static method to launch NoteEditActivity for editing an existing note.
